abstract: The Wall Street bank is acquiring $16 billion in customer deposits from GE Capital Bank, which General Electric is shedding to focus on its industrial business.
snippet: The Wall Street bank is acquiring $16 billion in customer deposits from GE Capital Bank, which General Electric is shedding to focus on its industrial business.
lead_paragraph: Goldman Sachs is broadening its effort to offer banking services to people with a wider array of incomes than it has traditionally served.

headline.main: Goldman Expands Retail Banking by Taking On GE Capital’s Deposits
headline.print_headline: With Purchase, Goldman Expands Retail Banking
